workplace, you must have care.

2903.text:
Because there is
such a co-dependency.

2906.text:

don't have peace of mind

2910.text:
And you can't afford great
care unless you're working.

2914.text:

sure that that happens.

that-- it's a powerful mission

2969.text:
who is interested in

like this-- to develop-- do

3069.text:

3075.text:

3080.text: and now we're 35 in the clan.

So that I'm not drinking

everywhere I go
